title: Just say no
creator_credit: Christiana Dumitru, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
brief_description: When Christiana Dumitru’s father died and her family had to move, she turned to a partying lifestyle. Hooked on drugs at an alarmingly young age, Dumitru reflects on the strength of will she had to summon to get back on track and the friends and family she has learnt to value.
creator_credit_for_label: Christiana Dumitru, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI

Hooked on drugs at an alarmingly young age, Dumitru reflects on the strength of will she had to summon to get back on track and the friends and family she has learnt to value.
